thread.section_title: Modern Bath House Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Modern Bath House | modernbathhouse.com
thread.title: l golant
thread.title_full: Modern Bath House reviewed by l golant

author: l golant
title: l golant
text: I ordered a vanity from modern bath house. The price was great - lower than Home Depot or other competitors. The vanity I originally ordered, white with grey quartzite top, was discontinued by the manufacturer, and modern bath house suggested to change it to the same vanity with Carrara marble top. I agreed. The marble was about $150 more, but to my surprise they covered the difference! The delivery went off without a hitch. All in all, I am very happy with my purchase.
